data.title: Yes Please!!!!
data.text: Look for this place!  The food is incredible and there is so much fun boutique shopping to do either before or afterwards.  The menu is top shelf and the servers are friends and professional!

data.title: A nice lunch
data.text: Delicious fried catfish with slaw and lattice cut fries.  I just wish the fries were hot, they weren't.  Good service, nice gift shop next door.

data.title: Gourmet lunch in Beaumont
data.text: I love Bando's for an intimate gourmet lunch. You can't go wrong here. All the menu items are made from scratch. Try the chicken strips or quesadillas.

data.title: Great lunch, lovely atmosphere
data.text: They are only open for lunch.  The food is always great.  The specials are wonderful.  The restaurant is very elegant & lovely for a nice lunch. This will be one of your favorite lunch restaurants.

data.title: Quiche oh my
data.text: If I want quiche, this is the place.  Absolutely the best quiches around.  Highly recommend.  If I can pull my eyes from the quiches, I also find other great choices.

data.title: I wish I had 6 dots - this place is a Vegetarian dream!
data.text:
I'm vegetarian and have discovered that many places in Beaumont don't even have one vegetarian item on the menu!  So, I was amazed to find that Bando's had several.  I had the grilled vegetable panini and it was just perfect!  Seasoned to perfection, grilled, and served with yummy crosscut french fries (made from real potatoes!).  A friend had the grilled veggie plate that was loaded with portobello mushrooms, pepper, onion, and squash - she said it was also delicious.  Another friend had wrapini with chicken, avocado, jalapeno's etc.  She said hers was excellent too.  I mean the food was so good, during the meal we kept talking about when we could return or order take out!

To top it off the restaurant is pure class with real tablecloths and napkins!  The servers are excellent and we couldn't have asked for a better meal.

We will definitely be returning!

data.title: Best Caterer
data.text:
Best of the best. Customer service and satisfaction is top priority. 
From hors d'oeuvres, the main course, to desserts always impeccable.

data.title: Consistently Good
data.text: The lunch menu provides excellent choices including daily specials. The home made soups are excellent.  All lunch entrees are delicious and the service is friendly.

data.title: Bando's Plays Fine Food
data.text: A quiet lunch place on 11th near Calder. Settle in to the semi-formal and cozy dining room just past two shops; one offers Catholic religious items and the other neat up scale accessories (mostly for women) and Texas team's stuff. The food is fresh and tasty. The chicken and tuna salad sandwiches (try the wrap) are prepared with just the right amount of mayo - perfect not soggy!  You must try the homemade chips. Finally, treat yourself to fresh made chocolates on your way out.

data.title: Sweet little place for lunch.
data.text: The food at Bando's is a bit pricey but it is good.  Many people eat and meet for lunch and it is quiet and you feel you can visit and have a nice long lunch.

data.title: Great Lunch Place
data.text: This is a great place for lunch.  Sandwiches and daily specials are great and so are their desserts.  Often don't think of it at lunch.  Some think of it as a "ladies" place but it is not.  They also do great catering.  Also nice quiet place for a business lunch.

data.title: EXCELLENT food and lovely Bistro!!!
data.text: I just adore their salad selection!  My favorite is the Grilled Chicken & Raspberry/Cranberry salad at lunch!  LOVE love love their flavored teas as well.  Their gumbo is great and their pintos are to die for.  Their staff is wonderful and genuine! I have eaten there 3 times in the last three weeks.

data.title: Great Food both in restaurant and catered
data.text: We recently ate at Bando's restaurant while planning the catered meal we purchased. The restaurant lunch was delicious, with ample serving sizes. The Christmas catered meal we ordered from Bando's was great and delicious, we had the pork loin meal which was a huge loin and served 22 people, all were very satisfied, and complimented the food. The prices for both lunch and catered holiday meals is very reasonable and the staff at Bando's are very helpful. and pleasant. I highly recommend Bando's for lunch and catering.

data.title: Great Food and Gift Shop
data.text:
The Bando's are wonderful people and excellent cooking.
excellent catering and customer oriented. can't go wrong

data.title: Hidden little gem!
data.text: A great place for lunch, and only lunch, since they are open only for lunch and only Monday-Friday.  Friday gumbo is excellent.  Good choice of salads, sandwiches and other selections.  The Wesley Special changes from day to day and is always a good choice.  Greek salad is great also, as is everything else.  Never had a bad bite here and the staff is great!  Highly recommend.
